Epic Recovery.name: Epic Recovery
Epic Recovery.flavor: Though your enemies thought you defeated, you stand up once again, injured but unbowed.
Epic Recovery.trigger: You start your turn at 0 hit points or fewer.
Epic Recovery.effect: You regain hit points equal to twice your healing surge value. You can then stand up as a free action.

Undeniable Victory.name: Undeniable Victory
Undeniable Victory.flavor: Time seems to slow as the cosmos aligns to present the perfect opportunity to cut down your foe.
keywords:
Personal

Trigger: You miss a target with an attack.

Effect: The attack instead hits the target.
Undeniable Victory.trigger: You miss a target with an attack.
Undeniable Victory.effect: The attack instead hits the target.
